A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Easily in my top 3 for best Star Wars movies.  Characters were given much-needed depth.  The action was fantastically done.  I had only a couple minor quibbles\, but they're absolutely drowned out by how good this movie was.\n\nDon't listen to the raging butthurt fanboys hating on the movie because it goes against their own fragile vision of what Star Wars should be.  It's good.  It's really\, really good.
